item.title: sumate
item.dc:creator: administrador
item.content:encoded:
[text* razon id:razon class:form-control placeholder "Razon social"]
[text* apellidos id:apellidos class:form-control placeholder "Apellidos"]
[text* nombres id:nombres class:form-control placeholder "Nombres"]

[text* localidad id:localidad class:form-control placeholder "Localidad"]
[text* provincia id:provincia class:form-control placeholder "Provincia"]
[textarea* message id:message class:form-control placeholder "Asunto"]
1 [_site_title] "[your-subject]" lcattaneo@santafe.gob.ar lauricatta@gmail.com From: [your-name] [your-email] Subject: [your-subject] Message Body: [your-message] -- This e-mail was sent from a contact form on [_site_title] ([_site_url]) [_site_title] "[your-subject]" [_site_title] [your-email] Message Body: [your-message] -- This e-mail was sent from a contact form on [_site_title] ([_site_url]) Reply-To: [_site_admin_email] Gracias por tu mensaje. Ha sido enviado correctamente. Hubo un error al intentar enviar su mensaje. Por favor, inténtelo de nuevo más tarde. Uno o más campos tienen un error. Por favor revisa e intenta de nuevo. Hubo un error al intentar enviar su mensaje. Por favor, inténtelo de nuevo más tarde. You must accept the terms and conditions before sending your message. Por favor complete este campo. This field has a too long input. This field has a too short input. There was an unknown error uploading the file. You are not allowed to upload files of this type. The uploaded file is too large. There was an error uploading the file. Please enter a date in YYYY-MM-DD format. This field has a too early date. This field has a too late date. Please enter a number. This field has a too small number. This field has a too large number. The answer to the quiz is incorrect. Please enter an email address. Please enter a URL. Please enter a telephone number.

item.title: contacto
item.dc:creator: administrador
item.content:encoded:
[text* Apellidos id:apellidos class:form-control placeholder "Apellidos"]
[text* Nombres id:nombres class:form-control placeholder "Nombres"]
[text* telefono id:telefono class:form-control placeholder "Telefono"]
[email* email id:email class:form-control placeholder "Correo electrónico"]
[textarea* message id:message class:form-control placeholder "Escribí tu consulta ..."]
1 Consulta desde la Página Web de Red Porteña lauricatta@gmail.com lauricatta@gmail.com De: [apellidos] [nombres] Email: <[email]> Consulta: [message] -- Este mensaje se ha enviado desde un formulario de contacto en Red Porteña (https://www.redporteña.gob.ar) [_site_title] "[your-subject]" [_site_title] [your-email] Message Body: [your-message] -- This e-mail was sent from a contact form on [_site_title] ([_site_url]) Reply-To: [_site_admin_email] Thank you for your message. It has been sent. There was an error trying to send your message. Please try again later. One or more fields have an error. Please check and try again. There was an error trying to send your message. Please try again later. You must accept the terms and conditions before sending your message. Please fill out this field. This field has a too long input. This field has a too short input. There was an unknown error uploading the file. You are not allowed to upload files of this type. The uploaded file is too large. There was an error uploading the file. Please enter a date in YYYY-MM-DD format. This field has a too early date. This field has a too late date. Please enter a number. This field has a too small number. This field has a too large number. The answer to the quiz is incorrect. Please enter an email address. Please enter a URL. Please enter a telephone number.
